sentences.sContent: He was found not guilty of the death of PC Jones.
sentences.sCn: 关于警员琼斯的死，他被判无罪。

sentences.sContent: Some journalists are guilty of reporting scandal in order to sell papers.
sentences.sCn: 有些记者为增加报纸销量而去报道丑闻，这种做法不对。

sentences.sContent: It was his guilty conscience that made him offer to help.
sentences.sCn: 他是因为良心上过意不去才提出帮忙的。

sentences.sContent: It was his guilty conscience that made him offer to help.
sentences.sCn: 他是因为良心上过意不去才提出帮忙的。

words.tran: 无罪的，无辜的；没有…的，不知…的

trans.tranCn: 犯罪的；有罪的；有过错的，有过失的；内疚的
trans.tranOther: having done something that is a crime
